sentences: Ta on lihtsalt neeger, kes ei tea midagi.
Ma ei taha olla neeger sinu silmis.
context: This word is a deeply offensive racial slur used to denigrate Black people. It originated as a derogatory term during slavery and continues to be highly problematic and hurtful. While it has been reclaimed by some within the Black community, its use by non-Black individuals is almost universally considered unacceptable.
